name: The Archimedes Shift
description:
The world has fallen to ruin and your goal is to survive.

The Archimedes Shift is an action dungeon crawler where you play as a young inventor as they try to survive in a post-apocalyptic world.  With their drone, they have to descend into labyrinths to collect resources to buy items and repair themselves in the days to come.  Entering the labyrinths is much easier than exiting however as there are many branching paths filled with enemies along with a boss that block the exit door.

Includes
  • A friendly ranged drone that is your main source of combat
  • Randomized dungeons that leads to new experiences every time
  • A range of bosses that stand in your path
  • Jet packs, ropes and shields to aid in your labyrinth descents.
  • A shop to buy and upgrade your stuff
Controls Keyboard 

A/D-  Movement

W - Jump

E - Interact

Mouse

Move - Aim

Click - Shoot

Submission for Ontario Tech GameCon for first year by Question Mark
